_header: For pride in heart he hates all one
_description: John Audelay, ‘Cantalena de puericia’ — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘And god wold graunt me my prayer / A child ayene I wold I were’

BodDou302.First Lines:
ffore pride in herte he hatis all oneWorchip ne reuerens kepis he
                    non…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…& make here trew satisfaccion& do my penans wyle y am
                    here
